hero.headline: Transform Your Body,
hero.text: Join me on a journey to become the strongest, healthiest version of yourself. Personalized training programs designed for women who are ready to achieve their fitness goals.

programs.title: My Programs
programs.subtitle: Choose the program that fits your lifestyle and goals

items.title: Personal Training
items.description: One-on-one coaching sessions tailored to your specific goals, fitness level, and schedule. Get personalized attention and expert guidance every step of the way.

items.title: Nutrition Coaching
items.description: Learn how to fuel your body properly with customized meal plans and nutrition strategies that complement your fitness journey and lifestyle.

items.title: Online Workouts
items.description: Access premium workout programs from anywhere. Follow along with video tutorials and track your progress with our online platform.

items.title: Free Supplement Consultation
items.description: Get expert advice on supplements from our certified pharmacist and doctor. Free consultations to help you choose the right supplements for your fitness goals and health needs.

about.title: About Me
bio: Hi, I'm Ajla! A certified fitness coach passionate about helping women achieve their health and wellness goals. With years of experience in personal training and nutrition, I've helped hundreds of women transform their lives through fitness.

My approach combines strength training, functional movement, and sustainable nutrition habits. I believe fitness should be empowering, enjoyable, and accessible to everyone, regardless of where you're starting.

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.text: Working with Ajla has been life-changing! I've lost 30 pounds and gained so much confidence. Her programs are challenging but achievable.

items.name: Emily Martinez
items.text: The nutrition coaching helped me understand how to fuel my body properly. Combined with the workouts, I feel stronger than ever!

items.name: Jessica Chen
items.text: I love the online workouts! They fit perfectly into my busy schedule. The results speak for themselves - I've never felt better!

contact.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
contact.motivation: Take the first step towards a healthier, stronger you. Let's work together to achieve your fitness goals and create lasting change.

form.successMessage: Thank you for your message! I'll get back to you soon.

footer.tagline: Empowering women through fitness and wellness.
